wolfganghud_reset_options_desc: Reset all Settings to their default value.
wolfganghud_reset_options_confirm: Are you sure, you want to reset all Settings to their default value?
wolfganghud_options_help: Customize WolfgangHUD with your personal preferences.
wolfganghud_language_desc:
Select a localization for WolfgangHUD.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
wolfganghud_panels_options_help: Options for all the general HUD panels.
wolfganghud_killcounter_options_help: Options for the appearance of the kill counter
wolfganghud_killcounter_player_show_kill: Display a killcounter on your HUD.
wolfganghud_killcounter_player_color_des: Select the color for your killcounter.
wolfganghud_killcounter_player_show_spec: Display kills of special enemies separately.
wolfganghud_killcounter_player_show_accu: Display your current accuracy on your HUD.
wolfganghud_killcounter_team_show_killco: Display a killcounter on your teammates HUDs.
wolfganghud_killcounter_team_color_desc: Select the color of the killcounters for your teammates.
wolfganghud_killcounter_team_show_specia: Display kills of special enemies separately.
wolfganghud_killcounter_team_show_ai_des: Do Bots get a Killcounter too?
